attributes.action: Amnesty for illegal immigrants who been in uk for 10 years
attributes.background:
This petition calls for illegal immigrants who have been in UK for 10 years or more to be given amnesty and the legal right to stay in the UK. 
This will allow these people to work legally and help to contribute to our economy

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301696

We also can't accept petitions that are started with an incomplete name.
